Package net.kyori.adventure.platform.modcommon

Interface MinecraftServerAudiences

All Superinterfaces:
AudienceProvider, AutoCloseable, MinecraftAudiences
public interface MinecraftServerAudiences extends AudienceProvider, MinecraftAudiences
Provides Audience instances for a specific server instance.
Since:
6.0.0
